rules.content: To mill five cards, put the top five cards of your library into your graveyard.
{i}Threshold{/i} {-} ~ can't be blocked as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

tags.setting: A sturdy turtle pushes through thick kelp forests in murky depths, its powerful flippers churning up clouds of sand and debris that reveal glimpses of buried treasures and lost scrolls.
